price: ߤߍ߲߬ ߌߟߋ߬ ߡߐ߰ߣߍ߲ ߸ ߡߎ߲߬ ߞߵߌ ߜߍߙߍ߲ߞߍ߫ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ߡߙߊ߬ߒߞߋ ߡߊ߬ ߓߏ߲߰؟
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
